-h|--help: --- show this help message and exit
-v|--version: --- Show program version info and exit.
-y|--noconfirm: --- Replace output directory without asking for confirmation
-a|--ascii: --- Do not include unicode encoding support
--clean: --- Clean PyInstaller cache and remove temporary files before building.
-D|--onedir: --- Create a one-folder bundle containing an executable
--key KEY: --- The key used to encrypt Python bytecode.
-s|--strip: --- Apply a symbol-table strip to the executable and shared libs
--noupx: --- Do not use UPX even if it is available
-c|--console|--nowindowed: --- Open a console window for standard i/o
--uac-admin: --- Using this option creates a Manifest that will request elevation upon application start.
--uac-uiaccess: --- Using this option allows an elevated application to work with Remote Desktop.
